name: Fome de Vencer
description:
Artist - Sérgio Sequeira

Programmers - Pedro Santos, Ricardo Cacheira, João Costa

Game Designer - Thales Martins (thalesamn@gmail.com)

Controls: 

Accelerate: Spacebar

Drift: Z

Brake/Reverse: X

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Turn Van

Up and Down Arrow Keys: Move Camera
